How to diagnose Desmoplastic infantile ganglioglioma ?,"How are desmoplastic infantile gangliomas diagnosed? In addition to detecting the signs and symptoms commonly seen in DIGs, head CT scans and MRIs may reveal the presence of this type of brain tumor.",GARD,D
